head.title: The High Price Of Contacting the Dead

hedline.hl1: The High Price Of Contacting the Dead

abstract.p: Jim Brennan on July 16 article on television psychic John Edward holds that while he may be talented, he is gouging the public (S)

block.p: Regarding ''An Encounter with a Television Psychic'' [July 16]: There is little doubt in my mind that John Edward has a very special and powerful ability. What is somewhat shocking to me is the fact that he charges $600 an hour (to be more precise, $300 for half an hour). Apparently only the rich will get the opportunity to be comforted by the spirits of deceased loved ones.

Regarding ''An Encounter with a Television Psychic'' [July 16]: There is little doubt in my mind that John Edward has a very special and powerful ability. What is somewhat shocking to me is the fact that he charges $600 an hour (to be more precise, $300 for half an hour). Apparently only the rich will get the opportunity to be comforted by the spirits of deceased loved ones.
Perhaps the spirits of the deceased would be well advised to boycott communication with Mr. Edward until he stops gouging their loved ones.
